content: The token Bambl(BOM) was created for the sake of experiment. This is a joke token (chewing gum). Which does not let you get bored in your free time.Even with the release of the doge token, there was an idea to create a chewing gum coin. This meme token is for everyone who loves meme coins.This is the answer to the Bone ShibaSwap token. The coin is anonymous. Our coins will have the status of a valuable asset. Every week we will burn 10,000 coins.
